page.title: 02Facilities in Guisborough
page.content: It is not easy to list facilities in our area as this is only \ of the town & e.g.the Cath.& Angl.churches are not in the area.But here are some:a centre for unemployed in a house renovated by the MSC with a Â£7500 council grant;a youth centre for 11-18s in a renovated house next door;4 weekly play groups;a Contact Mums scheme, in which newcomers meet a sympathetic mother in their street;a public library with reading clubs & storytime sessions;the cricket club,which also houses squash & table tennis;a rugby club,with Colts section for over 13s;keep fit classes in 2 primary schools;a centre run by the council,Sunnyfield House, where rooms can be hired & many activities take place; the Health Centre,with FP Clinic; Methodist Church Hall,with various activities; womens'groups e.g. Housewives Reg;WI;Townswomens'Guild.
